committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Energy and the Environment

official_title: To amend the Atomic Energy Act of 1954 to provide for the payment of the costs of decontamination and decommissioning of Department of Energy uranium enrichment facilities, and for other purposes.
short_title: Uranium Enrichment Facility Decontamination and Decommissioning Act of 1991

summary.text: Uranium Enrichment Facility Decontamination and Decommissioning Act of 1991 - Amends the Atomic Energy Act of 1954 to establish in the Treasury the Uranium Enrichment Decontamination and Decommissioning Fund to pay decontamination and decommissioning costs of Department of Energy uranium enrichment facilities. Provides for: (1) licensee decontamination and decommissioning fees; and (2) a Department of Energy study of cost-effective methods facility decontamination, decommissioning, and environmental restoration.

titles.title: Uranium Enrichment Facility Decontamination and Decommissioning Act of 1991
To amend the Atomic Energy Act of 1954 to provide for the payment of the costs of decontamination and decommissioning of Department of Energy uranium enrichment facilities, and for other purposes.
